text: Floor of the mouth    If cancer is in the floor (bottom) of the mouth, treatment may include the following:         -  Surgery (wide local excision).    -  Radiation therapy.    - Surgery (wide local excision) followed by external radiation therapy, with or without internal radiation therapy, for large tumors.
